title: Fresh Mint Chutney
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon cooking oil', '40g fresh mint leaves', '2 teaspoons cooking oil', '6 dried red chillies or crushed chillies to taste', '1 tablespoon skinned split black lentils (urad dal)', '1 tablespoon coriander seeds', '1 teaspoon chana dal beans', '1 teaspoon mustard seeds', '1 teaspoon tamarind paste', 'salt to taste']
